body: lgazissax discusses African governments: "The uprisings in northern Africa and the Middle East had gotten me wondering about certain things I’d read about problems of African government in general, and I wanted to see how they played out in different countries."

title: Africa: Let's Talk About African Governments

sentence: lgazissax discusses African governments: "The uprisings in northern Africa and the Middle East had gotten me wondering about certain things I’d read about problems of African government in general, and I wanted to see how they played out in different countries."
